athleteJoins() - Static method in class GameEnviroment.RandomEvent
generates an athlete and adds them to the players team if they have room (size of team below 9)
athleteQuits() - Static method in class GameEnviroment.RandomEvent
gets a random athlete from the players team and removes them from the team, the chance of a specific athlete being removes increases if they are injured
